News.headline: Match Officials: North Ferriby United v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Match Officials: North Ferriby United v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Match Officials: North Ferriby United v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Saturday's referee for the Daggers' Vanarama National league away game against North Ferriby United has been named as Steven Rushton
News.description:
The two assistants have been named as Abbas Khan and Hristo Karaivanov with the fourth official being Joseph Goodwin

Ticket information for the game can be foundÂ here.
